title: Higher-Order Thinking Skills (HOTS) Enhancement Program Using Problem-Based Socioconstructivist Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental understanding of collaborative learning
context.additional_context: Educational environment emphasizing collaborative learning and problem-solving activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world language problem situations and propose solutions based on logical reasoning.
Learners can generate creative language expressions by integrating diverse perspectives through collaborative learning with peers.
Learners can reflectively evaluate their own thinking processes according to assessment rubrics and develop improvement plans.

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Tablet PCs, Online Whiteboards)
Group Activity Materials for Social Constructivist Learning

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
